altTitles.ja: おじくんとめいちゃん

description.en:
Mei-chan is the strongest ally. The relationship between the two is "precious."

Ojikun has been watching over Mei-chan's growth since she was a baby. The unsuccessful manga artist business is a hard one, but with the positive Mei-chan by his side, even today is a relatively good day.
description.ja: めいちゃんは、最強の味方。関係性が「尊い」とSNSで話題の『いつでも励ましてくれる君』が単行本化！ 赤ちゃんの頃からめいちゃんの成長を見守ってきたおじくん。売れない漫画家業は苦しいけれど、ポジティブなめいちゃんが側にいれば、今日も割といい日になる。

altTitles.ja: エンバーズ

description.en: Middle school brawler Noboru Haitani has never lost a fight. But the bitter taste of a soccer defeat gradually warms him up to the sport, until one day Haitani finds himself in a match against a team featuring middle school soccer prodigy Takami. An outlaw fights his way into the world of soccer!

altTitles.ja: 天傍台閣

description.en:
Since ancient times, the arcane arts have been used as tools of political strife and weapons of war. Practitioners of these arts, known as spellcasters, sought to ensure the survival of their kind by demonstrating the utility of their powers to the government.

However, as the ages passed and the number of spellcasters grew, momentum built within the arcane community to reassess their societal standing. It was in this climate that a nation of spellcasters—commonly known as the Eastern Enchantment—was born. And the governing body of this land came to be called… the Empyreal Cabinet.

The curtain rises on an arcane saga of magnificent scale, right now!!
___
**Additional Links:**
- [Official X](https://x.com/tembodaikaku)
description.ja: 掲載時のカラーページを完全収録!!】古来より《祕術》は政争の具や兵器として使われ、祕術を操る《術者》は為政者にその力の有用性を示すことで種の存続を図った。しかし、時代の流れと共に術者の人口が増加、祕術界では術者の社会的地位を見直す機運が高まる。そして誕生したのが通称《東仙境》と呼ばれる術者の郷国（くに）。その統治機関を人々はこう呼ぶ《天傍台閣》と。　壮大なスケールで贈る祕術大河、ここに開幕――!!

altTitles.ja: 夢と恋ではつり合わない

altTitles.id: Cinta dan Impian Itu Tidak Bisa Digabung

description.en: Kurata Hikaru has fallen in love with her classmate Kira Kairi at first sight. Now, she's too lovestruck to concentrate on her studies. Her plan? Get Kairi to reject her so she can focus again.
description.id: Kurata Hikaru jatuh cinta pada pandangan pertama dengan teman sekelasnya Kira Kairi. Sekarang, dia jadi terlalu gila cinta dan tidak bisa konsentrasi dengan pelajaran. Jadi, dia berencana meminta Kairi untuk menolak cintanya agar dia bisa kembali fokus belajar lagi.

description.en:
A strange old lady appears before the 31-year-old protagonist, who graduated from a provincial university, has no connections, and no impressive credentials!

"Buy one for me..."

The old lady suddenly thrusts a piece of gum forward, claiming that chewing it will make you smarter, better at work, and even more likable.

The protagonist, caught off guard, ends up buying it. During a job interview, He absentmindedly swallows the gum, and from that moment on, things start to strangely go His way...

altTitles.ja: あゎ菜ちゃんは今日もしあわせ

description.en: A convenience store part-timer who can't seem to do anything right: Awana-chan. Today, yet again, she messed up over and over, and she can't even count how many times she was told off... How will Awana-chan find happiness in a situation like this, without anyone else to rely on!? This is a manga about creating your own happiness!!

altTitles.ja: このヒーラー、めんどくさい

description.en: Fantasy adventuring comedy starring Karla the dark elf cleric who invested too much on her taunting skills and Alvin the swordsman who has to put up with her.
description.ja:
「え？　回復魔法をかけてくれ？」
「私、命令されるとやる気を無くすタイプなんですよね…」

煽りスキルが異常に高いダークエルフの神官・カーラと彼女に振り回される哀れな剣士・アルヴィンの、異世界ポンコツ冒険者コメディ！
description.ru:
Фантастическая приключенческая комедия с участием Карлы, тёмной эльфийки-клирика, которая слишком много вложила в навыки грубости, и Элвина, мечника, вынужденного мириться с ней.

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://readmanga.io/etot_protivnyi_celitel___A5275))

altTitles.ja: 薪窯のパンドラ

description.en: Eri Hourai, a second-year high school girl, takes over "Pandora" - a bakery specialising in wood fire cooked goods.
description.ja: 祖父のお店を引き継ぎ、黙々とパン職人をしている高校生・蓬莱絵里（ほうらいえり）。ある日、突然お店にやってきたはらぺこ少女・野々宮麦（ののみやむぎ）から「メロンパン20個ください！」と無茶振りをされる。麦との出会いによって、恵理は少しずつ心が開かれていって…？
description.zh: 追随前人，过往足迹，今日的少女，也在进行烘焙

title.en: Tensei Shita Akuyaku Reijou wa Fukushuu wo Nozomanai THE COMIC

altTitles.ja: 転生した悪役令嬢は復讐を望まない
転生した悪役令嬢は復讐を望まない THE COMIC

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Shita Akuyaku Reijou wa Fukushuu wo Nozomanai
Tensei Shita Akuyaku Reijou wa Fukushuu wo Nozomanai THE COMIC

altTitles.zh: 转生后的恶役千金并不期望报仇

altTitles.en: The Reincarnated Villainess Doesn't Want Revenge

description.en:
“I’m not interested in revenge!” Rosemary was branded as a villainess and hanged for a crime she didn’t commit. She reincarnates as the commoner, “Marie,” while still retaining the memories of her previous life and hopes to live peacefully this time. However, contrary to Marie’s wishes, she ends up returning to the royal palace. 

“Sister, how do you want to punish the people who killed you?” Her brother, whom she doted on in her previous life, had changed completely and intended to take revenge on behalf of his sister. “Master, please tell me your desire.” The knight who swore allegiance in the previous life swears his allegiance this time as well. 

I’m not thinking of taking revenge on the person who killed me. However, the people around me will not allow that…
description.ja: 王宮付きの侍女として招聘されたけど、自分の前世は処刑された悪役令嬢なんですが…！　転生悪役令嬢マリーの、巻き込まれ王宮大改造劇始まります！

altTitles.ja: ギルティサークル

description.en: April! Sawaya Doji's college life at his dream school of Seio University starts with an encounter with the beautiful Kaede Hoshimi during the club recruiting fair. Sawaya believes that if he goes to Tokyo... if he joins a university... if he joins a club, he can get a girlfriend! It's a great way to meet new people, but what kind of club has he gotten himself into?
description.ja: ４月！憧れの青応大学へと入学した大学１年生・沢屋童二は、サークル勧誘期に美少女・星見楓と出会う。「東京に行けば…大学に入れば…サークルに入れば、彼女ができる！」と信じる沢屋は星見楓とともに派手目なサークルの新歓コンパへと参加するが……。沢屋が足を踏み入れたサークルの罪深き実態、秘密とは何か！？
description.pt-br: Abril! A vida universitária de Sawaya Doji em sua escola de sonho da Universidade de Seio começa com um encontro com a bela Kaede Hoshimi durante a feira de recrutamento do clube. Sawaya acredita que se ele for para Tóquio... se ele entrar em uma universidade... se ele entrar em um clube, ele pode conseguir uma namorada! É uma ótima maneira de conhecer novas pessoas, mas em que tipo de clube ele se meteu?

title.en: Hell Mode ~Yarikomi Suki no Gamer wa Hai Settei no Isekai de Musou Suru~

altTitles.en: Hell Mode: The Hardcore Gamer Dominates in Another World with Garbage Balancing

altTitles.ja: ヘルモード ～やり込み好きのゲーマーは廃設定の異世界で無双する～ はじまりの召喚士

description.en:
Yamada Kenichi, a single, 35-year-old businessman, has spent the majority of his adult life playing every MMORPG to hit the market. Tired of the constant cycle of repetitive, newbie-centric gameplay, he is immediately drawn in by the promise of a new game that, on top of being never-ending, offers up a "Hell Mode" — a difficulty level that makes it nigh impossible to level up but also promises uncapped growth potential.

Upon selecting the newly released Summoner class, Kenichi finds himself reborn as Allen, an infant in a serf family, with nothing but his wits and old memories to guide him. Allen works diligently to level himself up despite Hell Mode requiring vast amounts of experience between levels. In doing so, he hopes to uncover the secrets the Summoner class holds. All the while, he dedicates himself to freeing his new family from serfdom.
description.ja: 「終わらないゲームにあなたを招待します。 だって?」 健一が偶然たどり着いたタイトルのない謎のネットゲーム。 難易度設定画面で迷わず最高難易度『ヘルモード』を選ぶと、異世界の農奴へと転生してしまった! 少年「アレン」へと転生した健一は、謎の多い職業「召喚士」を使いこなしながら、 異世界で最強への道を手探りで歩み始めるが――。
description.pt-br: "Você será convocado para o mundo de um jogo sem fim?' Um dia, estava procurando um novo jogo, quando de repente vi aquele anúncio. Depois de escolher o modo mais difícil do jogo, 'modo inferno', de repente reencarnei em um novo mundo como um lavrador. Como um menino chamado Allen, comecei minha jornada em outro mundo com a maior dificuldade, superando todos os desafios para alcançar o maior título do jogo "Summoner" . ----- O romance promissor de 1º grau da revista 'Vamos nos tornar um escritor ', uma história extremamente aguardada.

title.en: Tonari no Seki no Yatsu ga Souiu Me de Mitekuru

altTitles.ja: となりの席のヤツがそういう目で見てくる

altTitles.es-la: La persona sentada a mi lado me mira de esa manera
La persona de al lado me mira con esos ojos

altTitles.uk: Однокласниця що сидить біля мене, дивиться на мене хтивими очима

altTitles.en: The weirdo one desk over keeps giving me THAT kind of look

altTitles.ur: Sath ki kursi par beithne wali mujhe "Un Ankhoñ" se deikhti he

description.en:
While you were admiring the girl in the next seat, she might be eyeing you up, too…? A new kind of “neighborly” short-form pure love comedy!

(Source: Sunday Webry, translated)
description.ja: 主人公の池沢くんは、同じクラスの美少女・江口さんのことを「そういう目」で見ている。しかし実は、江口さんも「そういう目」で池沢くんのことを見ていて！？チラ見えする筋肉、汗ばむ肌、髪の香り…互いに興味津々な2人の「下心」から始まる純愛ラブコメ！好きな人のなら、臭いも汗も×××も…全部好き。

title.en: Isekai de Te ni Ireta Seisan Skill wa Saikyou datta You desu ~Souzou & Kiyou no W Chiuto de Musou Suru~

altTitles.ja: 異世界で手に入れた生産スキルは最強だったようです。　～創造＆器用のWチートで無双する～

altTitles.en: It Seems the Production Skill Acquired in Another World is the Strongest.
My Isekai Crafting Powers Are Stronk

altTitles.ko: 이세계에서 입수한 생산 스킬은 최강이었나 봅니다 ~창조&손재주의 더블 치트로 무쌍한다~

description.en: 29 year old Kou Kousaka is an ordinary salaryman working overtime in a black company when he dies and is sent to another world. He is given the option to become a sage, hero, or demon king. However, he chooses none of them and instead acquires a hidden skill: the ability to store items in a limitless inventory, immediately dismantle them into materials, and then use them to create something new.
description.ja:
多忙と加齢により、趣味だったゲームにすら手を付けられない社畜サラリーマン・高坂コウ(29)は、ある日突然、異世界に転移させられてしまう。その際に手に入れたスキル、【創造】と【器用の極意】はあらゆるアイテムを創り出し、使いこなすことができるチートスキルだった!

忙しなく窮屈な生活から解放され、新天地で生きて行くことを決めた彼は、気ままな異世界生活を求めて冒険者ギルドの門をくぐる。竜人の女冒険者・アイリスの危機を救ったり、街の人々からの依頼をこなしたり。コウは早速スキルを使いこなしつつ、持ち前の真面目な性格と丁寧な仕事ぶりから、すぐに街の人々に受け入れられていくのだった。

「やるって決めたことには、手を抜かない主義だからな」

altTitles.en: Did I Seriously Just Get Reincarnated as My Gag Character?!

altTitles.ja: ネタキャラ転生とかあんまりだ! THE COMIC

altTitles.ru: Мне кажется, или это похоже на реинкарнацию сюжетного персонажа?

altTitles.id: Gila sih, reinkarnasi jadi karakter lawak!

description.en:
Toru Aikawa, a college student who spends his days immersing himself in games because his daily life is so boring, was standing alone in a forest in a different world before he even could realize why. Moreover, it seems that he has reincarnated into the "Neta character" he made in a game. The Genderswap reincarnation of the strongest heroine packed with overflowing Chuunibyo and ideals!

The strongest genderswap reincarnation fantasy begins here !!

---

**Note:** A Neta character is a character whose action has captured the hearts of viewers and players and has been turned into a important part of the story.
description.id:
Toru Aikawa, seorang mahasiswa yang menghabiskan hari-harinya dalam permainan karena kesehariannya yang membosankan. ketika dia menyadarinya, dia sedang berdiri sendirian di hutan di dunia yang berbeda karena suatu alasan.. Selain itu, sepertinya dia telah bereinkarnasi ke dalam "karakter baru" yang dibuat dari bermain game….

bereinkarnasi menjadi yang terkuat yang dengan Chuunibyo yang meluap-luap dan juga cita-citanya!
description.pt-br:
Toru Aikawa, um estudante universitário que passa seus dias mergulhando em jogos porque sua vida diária é tão chata, estava sozinho em uma floresta em um mundo diferente antes que ele pudesse perceber o porquê. Além disso, parece que ele reencarnou no "personagem Neta" que ele fez em um jogo. A reencarnação Genderswap(troca de gênero) da heroína mais forte repleta de Chuunibyo transbordante e ideais!

A fantasia de reencarnação de troca de gênero mais forte começa aqui!

title.en: Tou no Kanri o Shite Miyou

altTitles.ja: 塔の管理をしてみよう

altTitles.ja-ro: Tou no Kanri wo Shite Miyou

altTitles.ru: Получается, я теперь в ответе за башню

altTitles.vi: Isekai làm người quản lý tháp

description.en: Kosuke is killed by a truck, his soul is lost in a garden with two beautiful girls. The owner of the place will let him choose whether he will be reborn or summoned to another world, and he maintains the summons. In this new world, the main two girls who were created by the owner of the garden to help him find the mystery behind the world - a Dungeon tower. Will he be able to become the owner of this tower and manage it?
description.ja: 仕事帰りに交通事故に遭ったことから魂が別世界に飛ばされてしまった考助。彼は保護してくれた女神の助力により、これまでの記憶を持ったまま新しい世界で生きていくことに。さらに女神が創造してくれたという、チートな能力と天使のような羽を持つ最強美女ふたりをお供に、新たな生を送ることになったのですが――。
description.es-la: Kosuke es atropellado por un camión mientras regresaba del trabajo. En ese momento, mientras su vida terminaba, su alma fue transferida al "Jardín de la eterna primavera" donde lo esperaba una hermosa mujer. Ella inmediatamente lo lleva con la diosa suprema, encargada de dicho mundo. La diosa suprema le permitirá elegir entre poder entrar al ciclo de la encarnación y renacer para empezar una nueva vida o ser invocado a otro mundo, de lo cual él elige ser invocado. La diosa suprema antes de transferirlo a este nuevo mundo le otorga una habilidad divina y dos bellas y poderosas sirvientes. En este nuevo mundo, las dos chicas principales que fueron creadas por la diosa del jardín le ayudarán a encontrar el misterio detrás del mundo: una torre de mazmorra. ¿Podrá convertirse en el dueño de esta torre y administrarla?

altTitles.th: ตั๋วโกงชีวิต

description.en:
Lee Kyung Ho's mind was engulfed with ending his life due to bullying and the loss of his mother. He attempts to, but is saved. His determination to commit suicide somehow entices Sierra, a grim reaper who later offers him a contract. This contract blesses him with the ability to borrow the powers of the dead in their previous life in return of sacrificing years from his lifespan. For the sake of attaining what he wishes for, he eventually agrees to it.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=730656)

---
**Official Translations:** [Chinese (Traditional Characters) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771),  [Indonesian / Bahasa](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/ticket-hero/list?title_no=2195)
description.fr:
L'esprit de Lee Kyung Ho était complètement bouleversé à l'idée de mettre fin à ses jours à cause du harcèlement et de la perte de sa mère. Il essaie, mais il est sauvé. Sa détermination à se suicider séduit Sierra, une faucheuse sinistre qui lui offre plus tard un pacte. Ce pacte lui permet d'emprunter les pouvoirs des morts dans leur vie antérieure en échange de plusieurs années sacrifiées de sa vie. Afin d'atteindre ce qu'il souhaite, il finit par l'accepter.  
  
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771)
description.ru: Ли Кён Хо был поглощен идеей суицида, из-за издевательств в школе и гибели его матери. Очередная попытка, но спасен. Его решимость покончить с собой каким-то образом соблазняет Сиеру, мрачного жнеца, который позже предлагает ему контракт. Этот контракт даёт возможность заимствовать способности и силы мертвых из их предыдущей жизни, в обмен на силу, он должен жертвовать годами, которые ему остались на этой земле. Ради достижения того, чего он желает, он всё таки соглашается на сделку.
description.es-la: Lee Kyung Ho queria terminar su vida debido al acoso y la pérdida de su madre. Intenta hacerlo, pero no lo consigue. Su determinación de suicidarse de alguna manera fracasa, una persona llega y le ofrece un contrato. Este contrato lo bendice con la capacidad de tomar prestados los poderes de los muertos en su vida anterior a cambio de sacrificar años de su vida. Para lograr lo que desea y el acepta el trato.

title.en: Akuyaku Onzoushi no Kanchigai Seija Seikatsu - Nidome no Jinsei wa Yaritai Houdai Shitai Dake na no ni

altTitles.ja: 悪役御曹司の勘違い聖者生活～二度目の人生はやりたい放題したいだけなのに～

altTitles.ja-ro: Akuyaku Onzoushi no Kanchigai Seija Seikatsu

altTitles.ja: 悪役御曹司の勘違い聖者生活

altTitles.en: The Misunderstood Saintly Life of a Villainous Scion ~ I just want to do whatever I want in my second life~

description.en:
Ouga Vellet, the eldest son of the infamous corrupt lordly Vellet family, is a reincarnator. Having been taken advantage of due to his kindness in his past life, he now revels in the life of a mischievous villainous heir. From then on, Ouga spared no compromise, pushing the limits of "tyranny" to achieve his ambitions.

"Wow, Ouga-sama, you're amazing!"

...Just for "arrogant behavior," his reputation seems to soar without his control? The curtain rises on a life of misconceptions and misconceived saintliness!
description.ja:
悪徳領主として名高いヴェレット家の長男―オウガ・ヴェレットは転生者である。人の良さから前世で割を食ってばかりだった彼は、これを機にやりたい放題の悪役御曹司ライフを謳歌するため横暴の限りを尽くすはずが―


「さすがです！　オウガ様！」

……『傍若無人な振る舞い』をしてるだけなのに、なぜか周囲からの評価が瞬く間に上がっていき――⁉悪役御曹司の勘違いの勘違い聖者生活、開幕！

title.en: Zense wa Kentei. Konjou Kuzu Ouji

altTitles.ja: 前世は剣帝。今生クズ王子

altTitles.ja-ro: Zense wa Kentei. Konjou Kuzu Ouji

altTitles.zh-hk: 前世是劍帝。今生是渣王子

altTitles.pt-br: Na Minha Vida Anterior Eu Era o Imperador da Espada. Nesta vida sou um Príncipe Lixo.

altTitles.en: Sword Emperor previous life, Prince Trash this life.
Previous Life was Sword Emperor. This Life is Trash Prince.

description.en:
He was called a Sword Emperor who lived for the sword and died by the sword. And his end was a tragedy. 

However, by strange coincidence, he was reincarnated as the third prince in a country. He was enjoying his lazy lifestyle away from swords and heroism. As a consequence, people began referring to him as Prince Trash.

He never cared about his derogatory name until one day, he encounters someone who gets the wheel of fate to move in motion.
description.ja: 世間に悪名轟く「クズ王子」ファイ。その前世は「剣帝」と呼ばれた男だった。頑なに剣から距離を置き、グータラ三昧の日々を過ごすファイだったが、隣国でのある出会いをきっかけに、運命の歯車が動き出す。
description.pt-br: A espada, vivia pela espada e morria pela espada. Depois de dias e meses de batalha, o espadachim escolheu a morte por sua própria vontade, mas renasceu como Fai Hanse Diestburg, o terceiro príncipe do reino de Diestburg. Querendo se distanciar de sua vida passada, onde vivia como possuído pela espada, Fai decidiu levar uma vida perdulária, ganhando o apelido de “Príncipe Lixo”. No entanto, um dia, devido a um trato com a casa real de Afillis, o reino vizinho, Fai é enviado para a guerra, liderando tropas de reforço. No campo de batalha, Fai testemunha uma cena de desespero quando o “Herói”, uma existência com poder rivalizando com dezenas de milhares, varre o campo de batalha. Fai considerou retornar ao reino, mas a morte de um certo cavaleiro conseguiu abalar seu coração, então ele decidiu empunhar a espada mais uma vez – a lenda do príncipe preguiçoso mais forte começa!

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

altTitles.es-la: Un Mundo Donde 1 Hombre cada 39 Mujeres es lo Normal
El mundo paralelo con una relación de hombres y mujeres de 1:39 resulta ser inesperadamente normal

description.en:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

---

Alternative version: [A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal 【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/dcf01405-2bb3-40a4-bd8b-af1eb90c8e8e)
description.ja: 主人公「佐藤 蒼」はひょんなことから男女比1：39の平行世界の自分と入れ替わってしまう。入れ変わった先には、優しい家族や可愛い女性ばかりそんな彼女たちの外面を見て主人公は「男女の数が変化しただけで他はそんなに変わらないな」と安心する。だが、彼女たちの内面では葛藤や煩悩に溢れかえっていた。
description.es-la: Sou Satou, un chico de secundaria que fue transportado a un mundo paralelo. Este mundo resulta ser que la relación de hombres y mujeres es de 1:39, esto quiere decir que por cada 1 hombre en el mundo hay 39 mujeres, sin embargo, parece ser que este nuevo mundo resulta ser inesperadamente ¿normal?...

altTitles.ja: 寸劇の巨人

description.en:
*Attack on Titan* is now available as a four-panel manga! Eren, Mikasa, and Levi turn small and go on a rampage?! Laughter is inevitable!

**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Azuki Manga](https://www.azuki.co/series/spoof-on-titan), [Kodansha Comics](https://kodansha.us/series/spoof-on-titan/), [Manga Planet](https://mangaplanet.com/comic/6194404c847f0)
description.uk:
Хтось каже: «Я люблю Атакуючого Титана!!!»
А хтось: «Мене лякає Атакуючий Титан!»
А ти спробуй прочитати нашу "пародію" у вигляді 4-кома ! Вона знищить кожного, хто тільки зиркне на неї !

altTitles.ja: 今日もベランダで

altTitles.vi: Lại gặp nhau ở ban công rồi

altTitles.th: วันนี้ที่ระเบียง

description.en: A freelance designer loves to relax from work through gardening on his balcony. There he starts talking to his new neighbor next door over the wall without knowing her face.
description.ja: フリーのエディトリアルデザイナー・土岐田旬は、仕事に追われ部屋に籠りっぱなしの毎日。癒やしを求めてベランダガーデニングにハマるように。そんなある日、隣にちょっと変わった天然系の女性が引っ越してきた。ふとした出来事から、お互いの顔も知らぬままベランダの隔壁越しに話をするようになる二人。実は隣の女性は新進俳優・成海游なのだが……。ベランダとグリーンが繋ぐ隔壁越しの二人は？
description.ru:
Фрилансер дизайнер-редактор Сюн Токита настолько занят своей работой, что целыми днями сидит взаперти в своей квартире. В поисках отдыха он пристрастился к балконному садоводству. Однажды по соседству с ним поселяется необычная женщина природной красоты. Они начинают разговаривать через стенку балкона, не зная друг друга в лицо. На самом деле соседка — восходящая актриса Ю Наруми...
Балкон и зелень объединяют их через перегородку.
description.uk: Дизайнер-фрілансер любить відпочивати від роботи, займаючись садівництвом на своєму балконі. Там він починає розмовляти зі своєю новою сусідкою через стіну, не знаючи її в обличчя.

altTitles.en: デトロイト・メタル・シティ

description.en: Souichi Negishi is a common boy, timid, quiet. He loves flowers, walkings and musical hits like the ones that radios play. But he is also Krauzer II, leader of Detroy Metal City (DMC), the most popular underground metal band of Japan! Souichi would like to change his life and start to play Swedish pop songs with peaceful and loving lyrics instead of the violent and vulgar ones of DMC, but when he is playing with his band he completely changes his attitude and behaviour…

altTitles.ja: アオアシ

altTitles.th: AOASHI แข้งเด็กหัวใจนักสู้

description.de: Aoi Ashito ist ein Mittelschüler im dritten Jahr aus Ehime. Hinter seinem rohen Spiel verbirgt sich sein immenses Talent, aber Ashito erleidet wegen seiner allzu geradlinigen Persönlichkeit einen großen Rückschlag. Der Manager der Jugendmannschaft des J1-Clubs Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, erscheint vor Ashito. Fukuda sieht Ashitos grenzenloses Potenzial und lädt ihn ein, an den Probespielen seines Teams in Tokio teilzunehmen. Die Geschichte des Jungen, der den Fußball in Japan revolutionieren wird, beginnt sich schnell zu entfalten.
description.en:
Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent 
but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. 
One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, appears in front of him. 
Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. 
The story of the boy who will revolutionize football in Japan rapidly begins to unfold.  
  
---
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019**
description.ru: Ашито Аой, ученик третьего класса средней школы из префектуры Эхиме, встречает тренера «Молодежной лиги J» Фукуду Тацую. Несмотря на свою грубость, Ашито обладает таким удивительным потенциалом, что тренер Фукуда приглашает его принять участие в отборочных тестах своей команды в Токио. Взгляните на историю мальчика, который совершит революцию в японском футболе.
description.tr: Aoi Ashito Ehime'de ortaokul 3. sınıfa giden bir öğrencidir. Bir gün karşısına J1 Ligi kulübü Tokyo City Esperion'un altyapı takımı menajeri Fukuda Tetsuya çıkar. Fukuda Aoi'nin sonsuz potansiyelini farkeder ve onu Tokyo'daki altyapı seçmelerine davet eder. Böylece Japon futbolunda devrim yapacak çocuğun hikayesi başlar.
description.pt-br: Ashito Aoi, um estudante do terceiro ano do ensino médio de Ehime, conhece Fukuda Tatsuya, um treinador da "J Youth League". Mesmo que ainda tenha uma personalidade forte, Ashito tem um incrível potêncial que o fez ser convidado pelo treinador Fukuda para participar da seleção de sua equipe em Tóquio. A história do garoto que vai revolucionar o futebol no Japão vai começar.

altTitles.ja: エリオと電気人形
Erio and electric doll

description.en: The story centers around Ange, an electric doll, and Erio, a human raised by her. In order for Erio to experience the outside world, the two set out on a journey.
description.ja: 100年前に始まった人類とAIの戦争は、人類が電気を放棄することで決着した。電気を失った世界に生きる、最後の電気人形・アンジュと電気人形に育てられた人間・エリオの近未来スチームパンク冒険譚――。

altTitles.ja: 武錬天下

description.ar: رحلة الوصول إلى قمة فنون القتال هي رحلة وحيدة موحشة وطويلة. في مواجهة الشدائد يجب عليك البقاء على قيد الحياة والقتال بلا هوادة، وعندها فقط يمكنك الارتقاء ومتابعة رحلتك لتصبح الأقوى. تختبر طائفة الجناح السماوي الأعلى تلاميذها بأقسى الطرق لإعدادهم لهذه الرحلة، وفي أحد الأيام تمكن المتدرب الضعيف يانغ كاي من الحصول على كتاب أسود مما جعله على الطريق إلى قمة عالم فنون القتال.
description.en:
The peak of martial arts is solitary and lonely. It is an endless pursuit for unattainable heights as well. In order to surpass the limits of martial arts, growth and the will to survive in adverse situations is necessary.
One day, Yang Kai, a disciple-on-trial (and floor sweeper) of the Lingxiao Martial Arts Sect discovered a Wordless Black Book. That marked the turn in his luck and the beginning of his martial arts journey.
description.fr: Le chemin vers le sommet martial (Martial Peak) est long et solitaire. Face à l’adversité, il faut survivre et persévérer. Il est alors possible de percer et poursuivre l'ascension pour devenir le plus fort. Le Haut Pavillon Céleste entraîne ses disciples de la manière la plus sévère afin de les préparer à ce voyage. Un beau jour, le modeste balayeur Yang Kai met la main sur un livre noir, le lançant sur la route vers l'apogée du monde martial.
description.ru: Путь на вершину боевых искусств - путь одинокий и длинный. Перед лицом невзгод ты должен оставаться сильным и неотступным. Только тогда ты сможешь преодолеть все препятствия и стать по-настоящему сильным. Небесная Башня обучает своих учеников самым суровым образом, чтобы они могли выстоять в мире боевых искусств. Но только из-за одного самого незначительного проступка наш главный герой, Янг Кай, может быть исключен из Небесной Башни.
description.uk: Шлях до бойової вершини - самотній, відлюдний і довгий. Перед обличчям негараздів ти повинен вижити і залишатися непохитним. Тільки тоді ти зможеш прорватися і продовжити свій шлях, щоб стати найсильнішим. Небесна вершина випробовує своїх учнів найсуворішими способами, щоб підготувати їх до цієї подорожі. Одного разу скромному підмітальнику Ян Каю вдалося роздобути чорну книгу, яка відкриває йому шлях до вершини світу бойових мистецтв.
description.vi: Võ đạo đỉnh phong, là cô độc, là tịch mịch, là dài đằng đẵng cầu tác, là cao xử bất thắng hàn Phát triển trong nghịch cảnh, cầu sinh nơi tuyệt địa, bất khuất không buông tha, mới có thể có thể phá võ chi cực đạo. Lăng Tiêu các thí luyện đệ tử kiêm quét rác gã sai vặt Dương Khai ngẫu lấy được một bản vô tự hắc thư, từ nay về sau đạp vào dài đằng đẵng võ đạo.
description.zh: 《武炼巅峰》漫画版是由深圳漫画团队噼咔噼绘制，根据阅文集团旗起点中文网的同名小说改编，作者是莫默。武之巅峰，是孤独，是寂寞，是漫漫求索，是高处不胜寒。逆境中成长，绝地里求生，才能堪破武之极道。凌霄阁试炼弟子兼扫地小厮杨开偶获一本无字黑书，从此踏上漫漫武道。
description.es-la: El viaje hacia la cima marcial es solitario y largo. Ante la adversidad, debes sobrevivir y permanecer inflexible. Solo entonces podrás avanzar y continuar tu viaje para convertirte en el más fuerte. El "Pabellón Cielo Alto" pone a prueba a sus discípulos de las formas más duras para prepararlos para este viaje. Un día, el humilde barrendero Yang Kai logró obtener un libro negro, lo que lo puso en el camino hacia la cima del mundo marcial.
description.pt-br: A jornada para o Pico Marcial é algo longo e solitário. Indo de encontro com a adversidade, você deve sobreviver e permanecer vivo. Apenas aqueles que superarem os limites continuarão a jornada rumo ao objetivo de se tornar o mais forte. A Sky Tower testa seus discípulos de maneiras bem complexas para esta jornada. Um dia, o menosprezado Yang Kai conseguiu obter um livro negro, fazendo-o tomar rumo ao pico do mundo marcial.

altTitles.ja: 不思議のまゆりさん

description.en:
Yuusuke, a 7th grader, is interested in his friend's older sister for various reasons.
The older sister, while a little strange, is a kind and caring girl.
She's mysterious but is popular with everyone.  
This is an ordinary comedy about Mayuri-san's mysterious everyday life.

altTitles.ja: ドラマクイン

description.en: After saving Earth, aliens have taken up residence with the humans in Japan. Nomamoto, a factory worker with an abusive alien boss, one day meets Kitami, who tells her his own family was killed by aliens. The two quickly forge a friendship, but one day Kitami does the unthinkable…
description.id: Setelah menyelamatkan Bumi, para alien tinggal bersama manusia di Jepang. Nomamoto, seorang pekerja pabrik dengan bos alien yang kejam, suatu hari bertemu dengan Kitami, yang mengatakan bahwa keluarganya sendiri dibunuh oleh alien. Keduanya dengan cepat menjalin persahabatan, tetapi suatu hari Kitami melakukan hal yang tidak terpikirkan...
description.ja: <毎週月曜更新>宇宙人が地球を救ってから、人間と宇宙人が共に住むようになった日本。工場で宇宙人の上司にこき使われるノマモトは、家族を宇宙人に殺されたという北見と出会う。仲を深める2人だが、ある日北見がとんでもないことをしてしまい…
description.ru: Пришельцы спасли Землю и обосновались с людьми в Японии. Номамото, работающая на фабрике с отвратительным боссом-пришельцем, однажды встречает Китами, который рассказывает ей, что семью его убили пришельцы. Между ними быстро возникает дружба, но однажды Китами совершает немыслимое...
description.uk: Після порятунку Землі прибульцями, Японія стала спільним домом для них та людей. Номото, яка змушена терпіти знущання від свого боса-прибульця на заводі, зустрічає Кітамі, чиє серце розбите втратою сім'ї, вбитої прибульцями. Між ними виникає щира дружба, яка переходить до здійснення їх бажань... винищення всіх прибульців...
description.pt-br: Após salvar a Terra, os alienígenas passaram a viver com os humanos no Japão. Nomamoto, uma operária de fábrica com um chefe alienígena abusivo, um dia conhece Kitami, que conta que sua própria família foi morta por alienígenas. Os dois rapidamente formam uma amizade, mas um dia Kitami faz o impensável…

altTitles.ja: 帝乃三姉妹は案外、チョロい。

altTitles.en: The Mikadono Sisters are Surprisingly Easy to Deal With.

altTitles.zh: 帝乃三姐妹原来很好搞定

altTitles.zh-hk: 帝乃三姊妹意外的好對付。

altTitles.id: Kakak beradik Mikadono ternyata sangat mudah ditangani.

altTitles.vi: Ba Chị Em Nhà Mikadono Dễ Đối Phó Thật Đấy

description.en: Though Ayase Yuu is the son of a renowned and talented actress, he is below average in anything he does. He is entrusted to live under the care of his mother's friend, and later discovers that he will also be rooming with the three sisters from his school who possess both beauty and talent. Though Yuu thought that an understanding would be impossible to reach between an ordinary person and those blessed with talent, the three sisters are surprisingly...?!
description.id: Meskipun Ayase Yuu adalah putra seorang aktris terkenal dan berbakat, dia berada di bawah rata-rata dalam segala hal yang dia lakukan. Dia dipercaya untuk hidup di bawah asuhan teman ibunya, dan kemudian mengetahui bahwa dia juga akan sekamar dengan tiga saudara perempuan dari sekolahnya yang memiliki kecantikan dan bakat. Meskipun Yuu berpikir bahwa pemahaman tidak mungkin dicapai antara orang biasa dan mereka yang diberkati dengan bakat, ketiga saudara perempuan itu secara mengejutkan...?!
description.ja:
孤高の天才三姉妹と同居することになったちょっとポンコツめな高校生・優。平凡以下な彼が三姉妹に振り回されると思いきや…この三姉妹、案外、チョロい――？

優との生活で変わっていく三姉妹の心模様。才色兼備の三姉妹が動揺、狼狽、そしてときめく…
description.pt-br: Embora Ayase Yuu seja filho de uma atriz renomada e talentosa, ele está abaixo da média em tudo o que faz. Ele é encarregado de viver sob os cuidados de um amigo de sua mãe, e mais tarde descobre que também vai morar com as três irmãs de sua escola que possuem beleza e talento. Embora Yuu pensasse que um entendimento seria impossível de alcançar entre uma pessoa comum e aqueles abençoados com talento, as três irmãs são surpreendentemente...?!

altTitles.ja: 魔男のイチ

description.en: In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!
description.ja: この世界において魔法とは生き物である。そして困難な試練を乗り越え、魔法を習得するハンターたちを人は「魔女」と呼ぶ。ある日、辺境の山奥で恐るべき王の魔法（キング・ウロロ）と最強の魔女が激闘を繰り広げていた。しかしそこへ、場違いな一人の少年が乱入する。彼の名はイチ。魔女とも魔法とも縁の無い山暮らしの狩人が世界の常識をひっくり返す！
description.ru: В этом мире ведьмы охотятся за своей магией! В глубине леса ужасающая маджика и сильнейшая ведьма схлестнулись в бою не на жизнь, а на смерть. Но вдруг к битве присоединяется молодой парнишка. Его зовут Ити, и он обычный охотник. Но у него есть сила перевернуть весь мир магии с ног на голову в этом эпохальном магическом фэнтези об охоте!
description.pt-br: Neste mundo, as bruxas devem caçar sua magia! Nas profundezas da floresta, o terrível rei da magia e a bruxa mais forte estão presos em um combate mortal. Mas, de repente, um jovem garoto se junta à briga. Seu nome é Ichi e ele é apenas um caçador. Mas ele tem o poder de virar o mundo mágico de cabeça para baixo neste épico de fantasia de caça mágica!

title.en: Koi wa Ameagari no You ni

altTitles.es: Amor es cuando cesa la lluvia

altTitles.ja: 恋は雨上がりのように

altTitles.en: Love Is Like After The Rain

description.en:
Akira Tachibana is a soft-spoken high school student who used to be a part of the track and field club but, due to an injury, she is no longer able to run as fast as she once could. Working part-time at a family restaurant as a recourse, she finds herself inexplicably falling love with her manager, a divorced 45-year-old man with a young son.  
  
Despite the age gap, Akira wholeheartedly embraces his mannerisms and kind nature, which is seen as spinelessness by the other employees, and little by little, the two begin to understand each other. Although unable to explain why exactly she is attracted to him, Akira believes that a concrete reason is not needed to truly love someone. On a rainy day, she decides to finally tell her manager about how she feels… But just how will he react?
description.pt-br: Tachibana, uma linda garota do colegial está apaixonada... Não é um simples amor, algo que talvez seja impossível. Ela está apaixonada pelo gerente de seu trabalho que é mais velho que ela. Agora ela irá desistir de seu amor e viver sua simples vida cotidiana de colegial ou conseguirá passar os seus sentimento a alguém tão diferente dela.

description.en: “Chimeras” are people that have been infused with animal DNA in order to give them superpowers and abilities, however society doesn’t favor them so they live in fear and rejection. Our main character, code name “01”, works as a mercenary who happens upon an old acquaintance. He’s then given a job to protect and transport Enoch, a girl who is sought out to be the perfect “material”, to the borders of Canada.
description.fr: Les "chimères" sont des personnes auxquelles on a infusé de l'ADN animal afin de leur donner des superpouvoirs et des capacités, mais la société ne les favorise pas, si bien qu'elles vivent dans la peur et le rejet. Notre personnage principal, dont le nom de code est "01", travaille comme un mercenaire qui tombe sur une vieille connaissance. Il est ensuite chargé de protéger et de transporter Enoch, une fille qui est recherchée pour être le "matériel" parfait, jusqu'aux frontières du Canada.
description.pt: “Quimeras” são pessoas que foram infundidas com DNA animal para receber superpoderes e habilidades, mas a sociedade os despreza e vivem marginalizados. Nosso protagonista, codinome “01”, trabalha como um mercenário e recebe a missão de proteger e levar Enoch, o “material” perfeito, à fronteira do Canadá.

altTitles.ja: ポケットモンスター1Pコミック劇場

description.en: 1 page gag manga published in Gag King magazine by Square Enix.

altTitles.ja: 大福ちゃんと王子さま

description.en: For the first time, 19-year-old Setoya Kinari is striking out on her own, swapping life in the countryside for the bright city lights of Tokyo before her first semester of college begins. She has a few goals for her new life. Among them is goal one: move into the rowdy but lovable Kitten Blue Boarding House. Goal two: find a new love in Tokyo. But this boarding house has one problem—an extremely hot resident named Towa who totally mistakes her for a stalker. Yikes

title.en: My Bias Gets On The Last Train

description.en:
“Meeting her on the last train again today, if only I could talk to her!”
College student Lee Yeowoon works late and takes the last train every night.
Each time, he runs into Shin Haein, a woman carrying a guitar. As if by chance, as if by fate,
the two keep meeting and discover that their favorite artist is the indie musician “Long Afternoon.” They gradually grow closer and so the story began.
description.fr:
« La croiser encore ce soir dans le dernier train... si seulement j’osais lui parler ! »
Lee Yeowoon, un étudiant, travaille tard et prend le dernier train chaque nuit.
À chaque trajet, il aperçoit Shin Haein, une femme portant une guitare. Par un curieux hasard, ou peut-être par un coup du destin, leurs chemins ne cessent de se croiser. Ils découvrent alors qu’ils partagent un même artiste préféré : le musicien indie Long Afternoon. Peu à peu, ils se rapprochent, et c’est ainsi que leur histoire commence.

title.en: Isekai Mokushiroku Mynoghra: Hametsu no Bunmei de Hajimeru Sekai Seifuku

altTitles.ja: 異世界黙示録マイノグーラ ～破滅の文明で始める世界征服～

altTitles.zh-hk: 異世界默示錄米諾戈拉 ～從滅亡的文明開始的世界征服～

altTitles.en: Apocalypse Bringer Mynoghra: World Conquest Starts with the Civilization of Ruin

description.en:
Bedridden and abandoned, Takuto Ira spent his days in the hospital trying to beat the illness that was slowly killing him. His only solace lay in the nation management strategy game Eternal Nations, where he had built a reputation as the greatest player to ever live. 

After succumbing to his disease, Takuto awoke within the game next to Atou — the Hero unit for his favorite civilization, Mynoghra. Now they’ll set out to conquer the world together (again), one unit, settlement, and level at a time!
description.pl: Ira Takuto umiera w młodym wieku i budzi się w świecie przypominającym jego ulubioną grę 『Eternal Nations』 w której spotyka postać z gry, Atou. Razem postanawiają stworzyć własne królestwo.
description.pt-br: Eu reencarnei como um deus do mal. Ira Takuto sucumbiu à doença em tenra idade e acabou reencarnando em um mundo que lembrava o jogo de simulação de estratégia, “Eternal Nations”, do qual ele adorava jogar quando estava vivo. O que apareceu na frente dele foi Atou, uma garota pertencente à civilização do mal que eu costumava interpretar como “Mynoghra”. Os dois decidiram criar um novo país neste mundo mais uma vez.

altTitles.ja: フルーツバスケット
フルバ

description.en:
Tohru Honda, an orphaned high school girl, is taken in by the wealthy Shigure Sohma when he realizes she has nowhere else to go. However, the Sohma family shares a secret, and it isn't long before Tohru discovers that there's a reason why her classmates, Yuki and Kyo Sohma, never let girls get near them, and never talk about their lives before they lived with Shigure. And before she knows it, Tohru has become so tangled up in the lives of each member of the Sohma family that she couldn't leave even if she wanted to.  
  
As she learns more and more about the truth of the Sohma family and the nature of their secrets, she desperately searches for a way that she can save them. But what can one girl do, especially when it seems that she may have been part of someone's plan all along…  
  
[Official English](https://yenpress.com/9780316360166/fruits-basket-collectors-edition-vol-1/)

---
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for Shojo in 2001**
- **Attained the Guinness World Record for Best-Selling Shojo Manga**
description.ru: «Никогда не сдаваться, как бы ни было тяжело!» - девиз школьницы Тору Хонды. Её жизнь действительно не назовёшь лёгкой: вскоре после поступления девушки в старшую школу её мать погибает в аварии, а теперь Тору теряет и крышу над головой. К счастью, чудеса случаются не только в книгах: совершенно случайно о ситуации Тору узнаёт одноклассник Юки Сома, известный в школе своей привлекательностью и богатством семьи, и предлагает ей пожить у него, пока она не разберётся со своей проблемой. За неимением других вариантов, девушка соглашается, только вот… Сома – не просто состоятельная и знатная семья, это настоящий древний клан со множеством тёмных тайн и секретов, не предназначенных для посторонних ушей, и даже проклятием, с давних пор преследующим представителей этого рода. Разумеется, этот страшнейший секрет семьи Тору раскрывает в первый же день. А всему виной война Кошки и Мыши, война, у которой, оказывается, тоже есть свои причины…

altTitles.en: The Late Game Healer Is Way Too Strong

description.en:
South Korea’s top hunter, 'Mad Dog' Min Si-woo.

The moment he and his disciples defeated the Demon King! He was sent to another world, and after 100 years of battling in a monster-infested realm, he finally returned to Earth!

"But why has everyone forgotten about me?"

100 years in the other world was only 10 years on Earth. Now, a seasoned veteran hardened by a century of bloodshed, Min Si-woo sets out to find his lost disciples and uncover the reason behind his erasure!
description.ko:
대한민국 최상위 헌터, '광견' 민시우.

제자들과 마왕을 처치한 순간! 이계로 보내지고, 마물이 가득한 이계에서 100년 동안의 싸움 끝에 드디어 지구로 돌아왔다!

'그런데, 왜 내 존재가 사람들에게 잊힌 거지?'

이계에서의 100년은 지구에서의 10년이었고, 100년의 혈투로 '고인물'이 되어 돌아온 민시우는흩어진 제자들과 본인의 존재가 잊힌 이유를 찾아 나선다!

title.en: After School Lessons for Unripe Apples

altTitles.en: A 90's Cram School for the Unripened

altTitles.pt-br: Lições após a escola para maçãs não maduras

description.en:
That asshole is back as an entirely new level of asshole!   
  
In her final year of middle school, Hwang Miae is stuck with Kim Cheol, a boy she met briefly years ago - he's her classmate… and her neighbor. Now the other kids keep calling them a couple! In a flurry of uneasiness, Cheol starts to avoid Miae like the plague.   
  
You bastard! Do you think you're the only one going through this?   
  
But it doesn't stop there. Destiny won't leave them alone as Kim Cheol and Hwang Miae keep seeing each other everywhere… causing even more trouble. As strange friends intrude on their relationship, Miae experiences puberty the right way…   
  
A new project of <Cheese In The Trap> author Soonkki!
description.fr: Octobre 1998, Mi-Ae est juste une collégienne normale qui fait de son mieux pour mener une vie relativement tranquille à l'école. Elle aime lire des bandes dessinées, écouter le groupe pop «The Fire Boys», et faire du karaoké. Un jour, un garçon qu'elle connaissait est transféré dans son école et commence à causer des problèmes. Sauf que peu importe ce qu'elle fait, il semblerait qu'il n'apprécie pas les efforts de Mi-Ae pour apprendre à mieux le connaître. Ça veut dire quoi au juste ?!

altTitles.ja: できそこないの姫君たち
でき姫

description.en: Fujishiro Nanaki is super cute, super popular, and super annoyed with anyone as plain as her classmate Kurokawa Kanade. When Nanaki finds out her boyfriend’s cheating on her, however, her life makes a complete 180—as does her relationship with Kanade. This all-new yuri manga series explores the budding romance between the cool girl in school and the “plain” girl she once brushed off!
description.pt-br: Nanaki-chan é a popular da escola, ela exalta sua beleza com a maior auto-estima e arrogância possível, ela é a princesinha fútil e imatura que acha que a aparência é fundamental. Mas um dia tudo isso vai por terra quando ela leva um pé na bunda gostosim do cara mais bonito e popular da escola. E pra piorar além de ser esculachada pelo zé bundão, tudo isso aconteceu na frente da mina que ela até então tirava uma onda por não ser tão vaidosa como ela… Só que dessa "tragédia" ela vai perceber que beleza nem sempre é tudo…

altTitles.ja: 天使とアクト！！

description.en:
Ikurumi Akuto is the top of his class in every subject, including sports, and he knows it. The son of a well-known politician, a degree of arrogance is to be expected. But Akuto takes it to a new extreme with his condescending and self-important attitude. It doesn't help matters that his effeminate voice makes him a target of constant ridicule by his "lower class" schoolmates.  
  
Then Harusaka Nari enters his life, and Akuto's controlling personality is thrown off kilter by the optimistic but manipulating young seiyuu. With his life on the line, he agrees to be a voice in her Anime Research Society's project for the upcoming Cultural Festival... as the female lead?!
description.ja: 政治家を父に持ち、スポーツ万能、成績優秀、非の打ち所のない孤高の天才、凰生為人。が、そんな彼にも欠点が！

title.en: I'm Being Mistaken for a Soccer Genius

description.en: The Korean boy, Lee Jian, who was released from a prestigious youth team in Italy, spends his days idling away as a substitute even after arriving at the youth team of AC Firenze, almost as if he were running away.As usual, he boasts to his childhood friend, Kim Jiwoo, claiming to be a genius, but then he hears the shocking news that Jiwoo is coming to Italy to study abroad. Determined not to disappoint his precious (?) friend Jiwoo, Jian sets his sights on becoming a starter...

description.en: Takuya and Rika are co-workers for a travel agency and have barely ever interacted as they are both introverted, anti-social people. Both are doing their jobs as normal when an announcement from the higher-ups comes down: in one year, an overseas branch will be opening in Siberia, and an employee from their location will be sent to work there! While there's no telling who will be chosen to go, it is explained that people who are married and have families are far less likely to be sent! Neither Takuya nor Rika want to go to Siberia! Desperate to protect their solitary lives, they develop a plan: pretend that they are getting married to each other! Will they be able to keep up this charade for 365 days, and, maybe, even fall for one another in that time?
description.ja:
首都圏の旅行代理店、JTCの企画部に勤めるタクヤとリカは、共に人付き合いが苦手で目立たないが、充実した一人生活を送っていた。ところがシベリアの支店開設により独身者が優先で海外派遣されることになり、困ったリカはタクヤにとある計画を持ちかけて……。ほとんどしゃべったこともない二人が、たったの365日後に結婚することに！？

### 登場人物紹介
 
* 大原拓也●旅行代理店JTCの企画部所属。弱っている猫を保護している。やっと慣れてきた所なので家を離れたくない。

* 本成寺莉香●拓也の1年先輩。 クールに見えるが実は極度の人見知りで海外などもってのほか。 地図さえあれば幸せ。
description.ru: Такуя и Рика — коллеги по туристическому агентству, они практически не общались друг с другом, так как оба — интроверты. Оба заняты своим делом, как обычно, когда приходит объявление от вышестоящего руководства: через год в Сибири откроется зарубежный филиал, и сотрудник из их отдела будет отправлен туда на работу! Неизвестно, кого выберут, но объяснили, что вероятность того, что туда отправят женатых и имеющих семьи, гораздо ниже, чем одиночек! Ни Такуя, ни Рика не хотят ехать в Сибирь! Отчаявшись защитить свою одинокую жизнь, они придумывают план: сделать вид, что женятся друг на друге! Смогут ли они продержаться 365 дней и, может быть, даже влюбиться друг в друга за это время?
description.uk: Гонджоуджі Ріка та Оогара Такуя працюють у відділі планування туристичної агенції JTC в Токіо, вони не люблять спілкуватися і повноцінно живуть спокійним життям наодинці. Однак через відкриття філії в Сибіру Ріка запропонувала Такуї план, щоб не відправитися за кордон. Чи одружаться ці двоє замкнутих людей всього за 365 днів?
description.vi: Takuya và Rika là đồng nghiệp trong một công ty lữ hành ở Tokyo. Cả hai đều độc thân, nhưng họ không bận tâm, vì họ là những người hướng nội với cuộc sống viên mãn ở nhà. Thật không may, giờ công việc của họ là tìm kiếm nhân viên cho một văn phòng ở Siberia, và những nhân viên chưa kết hôn là những người đầu tiên được cân nhắc. Rika rất muốn tránh việc chuyển công tác và đến gặp Takuya với một ý tưởng: nếu họ giả vờ kết hôn sau một năm, họ có thể ở lại Tokyo. Vấn đề duy nhất là cả hai hầu như không biết nhau! Nếu hai người đồng nghiệp trầm tính này "giả vờ" một mối quan hệ, liệu nó có trở thành một mối quan hệ thực sự không?
description.pt-br: Takuya e Rika são colegas de trabalho de uma agência de viagens e quase nunca interagiram, pois ambos são introvertidos, pessoas anti-sociais. Ambos estão fazendo seu trabalho normalmente quando um anúncio dos superiores chega: em um ano, uma filial no exterior será aberta na Sibéria, e um funcionário de sua localidade será enviado para trabalhar lá! Embora não se saiba quem será escolhido para ir, explica-se que as pessoas que são casadas e têm família são muito menos propensas a serem enviadas! Nem o Takuya nem a Rika querem ir para a Sibéria! Desesperados para proteger suas vidas solitárias, eles criam um plano: fingir que vão se casar um com o outro! Serão capazes de manter esta farsa por 365 dias, e, talvez, até se apaixonar um pelo o outro nesse tempo?

altTitles.ja: 俺は大魔導士だ！

description.en:
Sunghoon Lee is nothing but a victim of a changing world, a powerless man in a land infested with beasts and magic. Monsters from another world invaded earth, and they brought with them a sickness that pushes Sunghoon’s mother into an endless sleep. To pay off her medical bills, he braved a dangerous job as bait used by powerful superhumans called Awakeners to hunt monsters. But when he found himself at death’s door, the image of his past life flashes through his mind. There, he found his truth: he is the reincarnation of the Sorcerer King!

description.fr:
La planète a été envahie par des monstres, que seuls les sorciers peuvent chasser. Notre héros, simple humain, n'a pas vraiment d'autre choix que de jouer le rôle d’appât dans les chasses s’il veut un salaire décent. Mais un jour, blessé par une de ces créatures et sur le point de mourir, il se rappelle sa vie antérieure… en tant que roi des sorciers, rien que ça ! Armé de ses souvenirs et de ses nouveaux pouvoirs, sa vie devrait vite devenir intéressante.

---

description.ja:
10年前、次元が拗れてモンスターが溢れ出た。 同時に生まれたモンスター覚醒者たちは→モンスターを捕まえて大活躍をする。 「吉澤覚」は月に4回、お母さんの病院代を工面するために 覚醒者のハンティングを手伝って、 後処理をする危険千万の「ポーター」として活動をする。 そんな中でモンスターに大きな怪我を負ってから前世の記憶が戻ってくる… ”ん？俺死んだのか？” ”俺は前世に大魔導士のクラトゥラスだったじゃん！！” 前世の記憶を持った「吉澤覚」のパワハラ魔法が始まる！

description.ko:
10년 전, 차원이 비틀리며 몬스터가 쏟아져 나왔다.
동시에 생겨난 초능력 각성자들이 몬스터를 잡으며 대세가 되는데...

성훈은 한 달에 네 번, 어머니의 병원비를 마련하기 위해
각성자의 사냥을 돕고, 뒤처리하는 위험천만한 '짐꾼'으로 활동한다.

그러던 중 몬스터에게 큰 부상을 입고 전생을 기억하게 되는데...

"어라, 나 죽었나?"

"나 전생에 대마도사 크라투라스였잖아!!!"

전생의 기억을 가진 성훈의 갑질 마법이 시작된다!!

*********************
판타지 화제작 데카스펠 작가님의 <나는 마도왕이다> 본격 웹툰화!
세계를 휩쓰는 마도왕의 마법을 웹툰으로 만나 보세요!

description.ru:
10 лет назад орда монстров из разлома в пространстве и времени начала атаковать человечество. В то же время люди начали пробуждать силу и охотиться на монстров за славой и деньгами. Санхун, нуждающийся в деньгах из-за болезни своей матери, берёт опасную работу, помогая охотиться на этих монстров четыре раза в месяц в качестве приманки. Но однажды, оказавшись тяжело раненным, он вспомнит свою прошлую жизнь.  
«Я что, только что умер? Погоди-ка, я был королём-волшебником Кратра в прошлой жизни?!»

---

description.pt-br:
10 anos atrás, a horda de monstros da fenda formada da distorção do tempo e espaço iniciaram um ataque contra a humanidade. Ao mesmo tempo que, as pessoas começaram a despertar poderes e iniciaram uma caçada aos monstros em busca de fama e dinheiro. Lee SungHoon, à procura de dinheiro devido à doença de sua mãe, arruma um trabalho altamente perigoso, ajudando na caçada desses monstros bancando a isca para os caçadores, fazendo isso quatro vezes no mês. Mas, um dia, ele é gravemente ferido por um monstro e relembra de sua vida passada como o Rei dos Feiticeiros. "Hã? Eu acabei de morrer? Espera aí, eu era O Rei dos Feiticeiros Kuratauras na minha vida passada?" Com as memórias de sua vida anterior, o espetáculo do poder mágico esmagador de SungHoon se inicia.

altTitles.ja: 要らない悪役令嬢、我が国で引き取りますわ　優秀なご令嬢方を追放だなんて愚かな真似、国を滅ぼしましてよ？

altTitles.en: Our Country Takes in Unwanted Villainesses. Banishing All These Excellent Noble Girls Is an Act of Foolishness That Will Ruin Their Countries, You Know?
We’ll Take the Unwanted Villainesses, and We'll Take Them Back to Our Own Country.

description.en:
I was reincarnated as the Princess of a small, insignificant country only referred to as the Struntz Kindom.

I, Brünhilde Rosenmüler Stuckenschmidt (yes I am aware my name is quite the mouthful), am the future Queen of my country. My Nation is surrounded by four other countries.

Even though it's a small country, it's quite okay. All of those foolish surrounding nations have the tendency to banish their people who happen to have extraordinary talents with abilities so amazing that they are almost cheat-level skills.

Thus begins the story of a reincarnated princess who aims to gather all of those banished "villainesses" and other villainous ladies into her Kingdom so that her small nation becomes the most powerfull and prosperous one of all!
description.ja:
私が転生したのは、ただ「隣国」と語られる モブのための小国の王女だった。

周囲を4つの国に囲まれたシュトルンツ国の 次期女王ブリュンヒルト・ローゼンミュラー・シュトゥッケンシュミット。舌を噛みそうな名前のモブ王女。

モブの小国だけども、大丈夫。周囲の国は、才能あふれるチート級の人間を 追放してくれるのだから。

周囲の国々で追放される悪女や悪役令嬢を集めて、国を繁栄させたい転生王女の物語、開幕！

description.en:
When the war between the aboveground and underground ended, humanity was joined by so-called "dungeon babies," those gifted with supernatural abilities and an obsession with the labyrinths below ground. 

Despite being a dungeon baby, Kim Jinwoo suppressed his instincts, choosing to live an ordinary life as a guide and caring for his family. 

But when an expedition goes wrong and he somehow ends up becoming the new owner of a labyrinth, he discovers that he cannot ignore his instincts forever...
description.pt-br: Os descendentes da humanidade que nasceram no labirinto e foram criados com o leite dos monstros possuíam uma força especial e corpos fortes. Quando retornaram à Terra, a humanidade os chamou de bebês da masmorra. Entre eles, Kim Jinwoo nasceu no labirinto mais profundo. 'Eu nunca tentei ficar forte, eu só queria viver.' Desde o mais humilde dos escavadores até o rei do labirinto, sua história de vida agora está se revelando.

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga

description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

altTitles.ja: 女子小学星のおうじょさま

altTitles.zh: 女子小学星的王女大人

description.en:
Himawari-chan, the Little Princess of the school-bag planet called "Girl's Elementary School Star" at the edge of the universe, has come to the Earth to find a husband.  
With the help of her maid, Sakura, Himawari-chan will start developing a bond with the earthlings.  
and with the big-breast Osananajimi, Kaguya as an extra, the Kawaii Bishoujo meteor love comedy now magnificiently dispatched.
description.es-la: Himawari-chan, la pequeña princesa del planeta "estrella escuela primarias para niñas" en el borde del universo, ha llegado a la tierra para encontrar un marido. Con la ayuda de su criada, Sakura, Himawari-Chan comenzará a desarrollar un vínculo con los terrícolas. Y con esto le esperan grandes problemas!!

altTitles.ja: タッチ

description.en:
Tatsuya Uesugi, the older brother who has no relationship with the word "hard work," and Kazuya Uesugi, the younger brother who tries his hardest in everything he does. 

They are twin brothers. They have known Minami Asakura, the only daughter of the neighboring coffee shop "Minamikaze" since childhood. You can't take your eyes off the "youth" of these three...!
